results.name: Riordan transform of the triangular number sequence A000217 with the Chebyshev S matrix A049310.
comment: For the analogous sequence with the inverse S Riordan matrix A053121 see A189391.
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (1 + x^2)/(1 - x + x^2)^3, {x, 0, 45}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 18 2017 *)
